document.full_text: no doubt sammy hagar, a former lead singer for van halen, has enjoyed a lot of far out experiences in life, but on monday, the rocker told perhaps his farthest out tale to mtv. he was abducted by aliens.
document.title: "red" rocker sammy hagar says abducted by aliens
lines_and_colors: no doubt sammy hagar, a former lead singer for van halen, has enjoyed a lot of far out experiences in life, but on monday, the rocker told perhaps his farthest out tale to mtv. he was abducted by aliens.
